sentences.en: Here the temperature never goes below zero centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这里的气温很少降到摄氏零度以下.

sentences.en: It was ten degrees below zero.
It's a sunny late winter day, just a few degrees above zero.
sentences.cn: 那是晚冬阳光明媚的一天，温度只有零上几度。

sentences.en: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
One minus one leaves nought [ zero ].
sentences.cn: 一减一 等于 零.

sentences.en: Set the counter to zero and you'll know where the recording starts.
sentences.cn: 把计数器拨到零,你就会知道录音从哪儿开始.

sentences.en: That night the mercury fell to thirty degrees below zero.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上温度计显示气温降到了零下30度。

sentences.en: The broken windows left us exposed to the sub - zero temperatures.
sentences.cn: 破窗子使我们置身于零下温度的严寒之中.

sentences.en: The children zeroed in on the display of toys in the store window.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的注意力都集中在商店橱窗里陈列的玩具上

sentences.en: The fuel gauge reads below zero.
sentences.cn: 燃油表显示油量在零以下。

sentences.en: The patient rates the therapies on a scale of zero to ten.
sentences.cn: 患者按十分制给这些治疗方法打分。

sentences.en: The teacher put a zero on his paper.
sentences.cn: 老师在他的试卷上打了个零分.

sentences.en: The thermometer fell to zero last night.
This new ministry was being created with zero assets and zero liabilities.
sentences.cn: 这个新部委正在筹建，既无资产也无负债。

sentences.en: Water freezes at zero degrees centigrade.

phrases.tran_cn: 零位电流；零压电流；无电流
零点漂移；最小容量；起点电容
零时；关键时刻；行动开始的时间
零点；基准点；致死临界温度
零容忍；零允差；绝不容忍
